field.name: contentProviderName
field.query: let $contentProviderName:=//exportCatalogueRecord/@contentProviderName let $patterns:=( '^https?://.+(elib)\.se/library/ebook_detail\.asp\?(.*&)?id=([^&]+)(&.*)?$', '^https?://.+(publit)\.se/api/get-item/.+\?(.*&)?key=([^&]+)(&.*)?$') return if (not(empty($contentProviderName))) then string($contentProviderName) else (for $link in //view/externalUrls/externalUrl/@value for $pattern in $patterns return if (matches($link,$pattern)) then replace($link,$pattern,'$1') else ())[position() eq 1]
